summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 41st Avenue Southwest from West Thistle Street to approximately 217 feet south of West Cloverdale Street; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16765 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
